metadata.description: Welcome to the Bot. It makes great stuff

help.message:
/help - for command descriptions.
/create_question - create a new question

scene.enter_message: Do you want to create a new quiz question?
scene.create_quiz_question_message_example:
Please provide a quiz question in form of:
<question>
<comma separated options>
<correct answer> or <correct answer number>

You can attach a picture to the message.
 Example: What is the third planet in the solar system?
Earth,Mercury,Pluto,Jupiter
Earth (or 1)
scene.error_no_quiz_provided: You have not provided any text. Please repeat.
scene.error_quiz_has_incorrect_structure: The structure of your message is incorrect. Retry
scene.error_quiz_has_correct_answer_does_not_e: The correct answer does not exists in the provided answers
